refnamediv.refpurpose: Upload a new BPEL script source

refsect2.title: name
refsect2.para:
varchar
a human readable name for script

refsect2.title: url
refsect2.para:
varchar
the URL to the script source

refsect2.title: content
refsect2.para:
any
as an alternative to the URL, the content can be specified.

refsect1.title: Return Types
refsect1.para: returns an integer unique identifier for the uploaded script

refsect1.title: Description
refsect1.para:
BPEL.BPEL.script_upload
uploads a new BPEL script, makes expanded version, and put into edit mode. If content is supplied the function will not try to download or check the URL specified.

example.title: Simple example
example.screen:
SQL> select BPEL.BPEL.script_upload ('LoanFlow', 'file:/LoanFlow.bpel', null); unnamed INTEGER _______________________________________________________________________________
1
